title: Bag appears when lucene bundle is refreshing in Felix console
description: When I'm installing fragment bundle (where fragment-host is lucene bundle (org.apache.jackrabbit.oak-lucene)) in OSGi, and then when I'm refreshing lucene bundle, web-site stops working.

comments.content: Lucene doesn't maintain OSGi bundles, so I think you'll have to take this up with the project you get the bundles from?
comments.author: Steve Rowe
